  • Method Details

    • checkoutSord

      Sord checkoutSord​(java.lang.String objId, SordZ sordZ, LockZ lockZ) throws byps.RemoteException
      Read the data of an existing archive entry. This function calls IXConnIXServicePortIF.checkoutSord which returns an EditInfo object.
      Parameters:
      objId - Object ID, GUID, archive path ...
      sordZ - Elements to be returned
      lockZ - Lock archive entry.
      Returns:
      Sord object.
      Throws:
      byps.RemoteException

    • createSord

      Sord createSord​(java.lang.String parentId, java.lang.String maskId, SordZ sordZ) throws byps.RemoteException
      Create an initialized Sord object. This function calls IXConnIXServicePortIF.createSord.
      Parameters:
      parentId - ID of parent entry.
      maskId - ID or name of keywording form.
      sordZ - Elements to be returned
      Returns:
      Sord object
      Throws:
      byps.RemoteException
